full_description:
Vyvylabs VBL0120-02 Leca Digital Display 10000mAh 20W Power Bank

The Vyvylabs VBL0120-02 10000mAh Leca Digital Display Fast Charge Power Bank in sleek black is the perfect mobile charging companion, intended to satisfy all of your power demands efficiently and reliably. This VBL0120-02 power bank has a powerful 10000mAh Polymer Lithium Battery that will keep your gadgets charged all day, allowing you to be connected whenever and wherever you need. With a rated capacity of 8000mAh, this VBL0120-02 power bank provides constant and dependable performance, allowing you to get the most out of each charge. What distinguishes it is its impressive energy conversion rate of at least 80%, which ensures little energy loss during power transfer, boosting charging efficiency and lowering charging time. This VBL0120-02 power bank is compatible with a broad range of devices, including smartphones and tablets, digital cameras, and more, thanks to its diverse input and output choices, which include Type-C input with 5V/3A, 9V/2.22A, and 12V/1.67A, as well as USB and Type-C outputs with the same voltages. Its overall output of 20W offers rapid and effective charging, allowing you to charge your gadgets quickly and easily. The built-in digital display gives real-time information regarding remaining power, allowing you to anticipate your charging needs and avoid being caught off guard by a dead battery. Despite its amazing capabilities, this power bank is tiny and lightweight, measuring only 151.8mm x 69.5mm x 16.3mm and weighing only 218g, making it simple to carry in your bag or pocket wherever you go. Whether you're traveling, hiking, camping, or simply on the go, the Vyvylabs VBL0120-02 Leca Digital Display Fast Charge Power Bank keeps you charged up and connected at all times, giving you complete peace of mind about your mobile charging needs.

With a real capacity of 10000mAh/3.7V and a claimed capacity of 6000mAh, it has enough power to keep your gadgets powered all day. With an energy conversion rate of ≥60%, this power bank reduces energy loss when charging for maximum efficiency and consistent performance. Its numerous input and output choices, including Type-C and Micro interfaces, provide flexibility and simplicity for charging your devices. The Type-C interface allows fast charging at 5V/3A, 9V/2.22A, and 12V/1.67A (20W Max), whereas the Micro input supports rapid charging at 5V/3A, 9V/2A, and 12V/1.5A (18W Max). The power bank has a Type-C output with PD3.0PPS*QC3.0 technology, which provides quick and efficient charging at 5V/3A, 9V/2.22A, and 12V/1.67A (20W Max). It also has two USB-A outputs, capable of supplying 5V/3A, 9V/2.22A, and 12V/1.67A (20W Max), so you can charge many devices at the same time. With its built-in digital display, you can simply check the power bank's remaining capacity, keeping you informed and prepared for your charging needs. Compact and lightweight, the Vyvylabs VBP0120-02 Boya Digital Display Fast Charge Power Bank is intended for mobility, making it ideal for travel, outdoor adventures, or everyday use. full_description:
Vyvylabs P1 VP14100 Outdoor Digital Display Mini 40000mAh 100W Power Bank

The Vyvylabs P1 VP14100 Outdoor Digital Display Mini 40000mAh 100W Power Bank is the pinnacle of durability, adaptability, and power for outdoor lovers and explorers. This power bank, made with precision from a combination of durable Aluminum Alloy and PC components, is designed to survive the rigors of the outdoors, with an exceptional waterproof certification of IP67. Whether you're traveling through jungles or conquering harsh slopes, your power source will be shielded from water and dust. The P1 VP14100 has a high-definition TFT-LCD screen with an 80x160 resolution, providing a clear and straightforward interface for monitoring battery levels, charging status, and other important information. Its innovative lighting system has five movable gears that provide flexible illumination options for a variety of outdoor conditions. With a primary light output of 5W and 500LM, supported by an ambient light of same intensity, this power bank provides excellent visibility in every scenario, from pitch-black evenings to poorly lit campsites. Under the hood is a powerhouse of energy, fueled by a cutting-edge 3.85V High Voltage Polymer Battery with a massive 40000mAh capacity. The power bank, divided into four 10000mAh batteries, has a rated capacity of 26000mAh or 15.4V (154Wh), offering enough of power to keep your gadgets charged during your trips. Charging the P1 VP14100 is simple owing to its two Type-C inputs. Type-C1 supports input voltages ranging from 5V/3A to 20V/5A, and Type-C2 offers various input possibilities from 5V/3A to 20V/1.5A, giving you the ability to recharge. Whether you're going on a long wilderness expedition or a weekend camping trip, the Vyvylabs P1 VP14100 keeps you fueled up and connected, giving you the ultimate peace of mind and convenience on your outdoor excursions.
